jobDescription: Genuent is hiring a Data Reporting Analyst for our direct client in Richardson, Texas. Qualified candidates should send their resume to Tele De La Cruz at Tdelacruz@genuent.com  Data Reporting Analyst  Richardson, TX  Direct Hire/Full Time  The Data Reporting Analyst will be responsible for data analysis and reporting functions in order to give the business department access to what they need.  Experience Must have a minimum of 2 to 3 years of experience in analysis of business related data and information systems.  Skills Not required to understand the business, responsible for gathering the data provided using technology provided (SQL Server) to take/create reports and translate data  Work directly with employees on the business side to give them access to the information they need  Analyze software application data /requirements provided using technology to take/create reports and translate data to work directly with employees on the business side to give them access to the information they need  Execute ETL packages to move data  Expert in Excel  Must be able to demonstrate a basic knowledge of program evaluation methods, statistical analysis, research skills, management information systems, and strategic planning  Must be able to demonstrate a working knowledge of statistical analysis, database design and analysis and management information systems  Must be able to demonstrate knowledge with regard to the software application used in the assigned area  Working knowledge of Microsoft SQL  Take reports and turn into SSRS or Power BI  Familiarity with Scrum methods  Familiarity with Team Foundation Services  Technologies Microsoft SQL Server 2012, 2014, 2016  MS BI Stack (SSRS, SSIS, SSAS)  Soft Skills Possess an analytically and intelligently curiosity  Multi-Task  Deliver what is asked  Proactive  Team Player  Attention to detail, following methods, procedures, standard and specifications with exactness  Excellent verbal and written communications skills and excellent presentation skills  Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills, working in a team environment  Optional Skills/Technologies TFS ALM T-SQL TFS Source Control  Seagate Crystal Reports/ETL/BI  Experience working with ETL environments using multiple sources of data  Qualified candidates should send their resume to Tele De La Cruz at Tdelacruz@genuent.com
